apps.name: Sponkify

apps.versionDescription: Now you can be Sponky with Spotify. Maximum Sponk, 10x last version, big yes, ultra approve.
apps.localizedDescription: Sponk. That's about it. Enjoy the Sponking

permissions.usageDescription: Allows Clip to continuously monitor your clipboard in the background.
